name: Interconnector UK Limited
membership:
1)  ENTSOG  - European Network of Transmission System Operators for Gas
2) GIE  -  Gas Infrastructure Europe
goal: IUK is a Transmission System Operator.  It owns and operates the gas interconnector between the UK and Belgium.  It seeks a regulatory environment appropriate to this type of asset and one which facilitates cross-border gas trade.
euInitiatives:
Internal Energy Market legislation
Network Codes
Security of Supply Regulation
Energy Union
Infrastructure and Interconnector policies
EU strategy for LNG and gas storage
